thread.title: EastEnders viewers blast the soap's young cast: 'It's literally turned into Grange Hill'
thread.title_full: EastEnders viewers blast the soap's young cast: 'It's literally turned into Grange Hill'

author: Joshua Haigh
title: EastEnders viewers blast the soap's young cast: 'It's literally turned into Grange Hill'
text:
Get soaps updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
EastEnders viewers have claimed they barely recognise the show anymore. 
With a host of younger characters being introduced, including Michelle's American teenager lover and her niece Bex, fans of the soap are complaining that it's not the same anymore. 
After the latest episode started with a group of school girls pining over Preston in front of Michelle, viewers raced to social media to criticise the show for turning into "teenage" drama. 
One angry fan wrote: "Since when did EastEnders become Grange Hill?" Fans don't like where the show is headed (Photo: BBC) BBC viewers criticised the soap on Twitter (Photo: BBC) 
"EastEnders = Grange Hill + Waterloo Road," said a second. 
A third annoyed viewer tweeted: "Missed a few episodes..sadly it's still and like Grange Hill #eastenders" 
While another added: "God #Eastenders can you please STOP with all the teen angst storylines, I'm sick of it."
